definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: old (orig., as it seems, withered, flabby , like a lifeless plant with top hanging down, as if in sleep; cf.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: supr., and NH [[יׇשַׁן]] Pi.let a thing grow old )—[[יׇשָׁן]] Le 25:22 + 3 t.; f. [[יׇשָׁנׇה]] Is 22:11 + 2 t.; pl. [[יְשָׁנִיס]] Ct So 7:13; —old: [[הַבְּרֵכָה]] [[הַיְשָׁנׇה]] Is 22:11; [[שַׁעַר הַיְשָׁנׇה]] Ne 3:6; so Ne 12:39; of choice fruits, Ct So 7:13 (opp. [[חדשׁ]]); subst. old harvest, store, Le 25:22, Le 25:22, Le 26:12, Le 26:12 (H; opp. [[חדשׁ]]).
